game.shortDescriptionEn: âš¡ï¸Fix electronics ğŸ“ˆmanage firm ğŸ’»challenge the hacker... ServiceIT is a simulation game where you run a full-service IT company to engage in tasks like diagnosing, repairing equipment, network infiltration, programming, server management while an Anonymous hacker keeps sabotaging it all.
